resources.string: Player information notification for keep player alive
Notification for keep media retriever alive
Select screen to show on launch
Specify formatting pattern of a sentence to post

Track name: TI
Artist name: AR
Album name: AL
escape sequence: Wrap by ' '
line break: \n
Set timer length and the tolerance
Select root folder of retrieving media
Dropbox sync feature will download all target tracks temporary and delete it after the task is done.\nTherefore it may take a lot of time and cause large amount of download.\nAre you sure?
Remove downloaded file from the device?
Error\nFailed to donate since you already have purchased item.
Select screen to show on launch
Show artwork on background of lock screen
Enable duking on other app play sound
Fill following fields by new metadata values
